argument.name: value
argument.description: The value to set the ViewBox.

argument.name: flagFireChangeEvent
argument.description: Optional. true/false. Default behavior is true. Dictates whether or not the change event(s) should be triggered

page.description: Sets the ViewBox value. If flagFireChangeEvent is true, the change event if first. Default for is flagFireChangeEvent true.

section.note: You can also set the value on a ViewBox using the generic {dialog.object}.setValue() method. The A5.ViewBox.setValue() method is convenient when you already have a pointer to the ViewBox control.
section.example: var vbObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('MYVIEWBOX1'); //get pointer to the ViewBox vbObj.setValue('value1');
